word_mean_info__list.difference: 表一种必然的可能性，也可表示信心或不轻信。强调主观判断。
指自然而然，毫无造作或天生如此。
指毫无疑问，自然如此。可与certainly和naturally换用。

word_group.brief_definition: 缓慢但扎实地, 稳扎稳打地

bilingual.source: Surely happiness was the purpose of living.
bilingual.target: 当然，幸福是生活的目的。

bilingual.source: Surely, smoking can cause lots of serious problems.
bilingual.target: 当然，吸烟会造成很多严重的问题。

bilingual.source: The fixation on genes as destiny is surely false too.
bilingual.target: 将基因视为命运的观点当然也是错误的。

bilingual.source: Surely we will aim to finally eradicate disease and poverty.
bilingual.target: 当然，我们的目标是最终消除疾病和贫困。

bilingual.source: And surely we will aim to finally eradicate disease and poverty.
bilingual.target: 当然，我们的目标是最终根除疾病和贫困。
当然是坐在他的包座上，对吗？
它的作用当然是为了交流。

yingyinNormal.en: Where is he? Surely tending to his round-eyed pet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他在哪里？当然是去照顾他的大圆眼男宠了。

yingyinNormal.en: Surely, when you close your eyes at night, you pray for a man of noble character.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，晚上闭上眼睛的时候会祈求一位高尚男子的到来。

yingyinNormal.en: Surely, he does everything in his power to bolster his defenses, rectify his weaknesses.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，他竭尽所能想加强防御修正自己的弱点。

yingyinNormal.en: No, but, should they leave him there? Surely the decision is down to the new Marquess not to Bertie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道，但把他留在那里合适吗？这当然得由新任侯爵来决定，不是伯蒂。

yingyinNormal.en: But whatever happened was not Mr Bates's fault, surely?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但那件事并不是贝茨先生的错啊。

yingyinNormal.en: But surely it must be legal or do there have to be witnesses?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但这该是合法的吧？还是需要见证人？

yingyinNormal.en: Dr. Bennet, is it really necessary? Surely there must be some...
yingyinNormal.zh: 班内特医生，真的要这样做吗？肯定还有什么 ……
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《爱丽丝梦游仙境2：镜中奇遇记》

yingyinNormal.en: We'd like Mr Carson to be Chairman of our Committee. But surely, His Lordship?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们想让卡森先生担任委员会主席。可是，老爷。

yingyinNormal.en: Surely you mean my subjugation? It is not for me to interpret my liege's intent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是指让我臣服于你们吧？大汗的旨意我不敢妄加揣测。

yingyinNormal.en: Your coming will be a rather confirmation, surely if indeed such a report exists.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果外界真有这种流言，那么你赶到这反而会弄假成真。

yingyinNormal.en: I am confident. Surely. I think the taste will deliver. The health aspect for sure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很有信心。我认为味道说明一切。在健康方面肯定没问题。

yingyinNormal.en: Surely the right place is in the center of the village where people pass it every day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最合适的选址应该是在村子中央，人们能每天经过。

yingyinNormal.en: Serial killers choose their victims at random. Surely that must make it more difficult.
yingyinNormal.zh: 连环杀手的被害人是随机选出来的。这肯定让抓到凶手更难了吧。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm calling her on your phone, Sherlock. Make her say it. Say what? Obvious, surely. No. Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在用你的手机给她打电话，夏洛克。让她说。说什么？太明显了。不。很明显。

yingyinNormal.en: You must know. Surely you must know it was all for you. You are too generous to trifle with me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你必须知道 你一定要知道，这一切都是为了你所做的。你是个爽快的人，绝不会开我的玩笑。

yingyinNormal.en: A magician never reveals his secrets. But surely a future Nobel Prize winner can figure it out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 魔术师是不会透露他的秘密的，但未来的诺奖得主肯定能搞明白的。

yingyinNormal.en: Did Leonard know about this? Leonard's my best friend in the world. Surely Leonard didn't know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱纳德知道吗？他是我最好的朋友，他肯定不知道。

yingyinNormal.en: Sidao is not here? With regret, no. Surely, the same regret the Great Khan offers for not attending.
yingyinNormal.zh: 贾似道没来吗？很抱歉，他没来，显然，大汗也很抱歉没能亲临吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Because my ancestors have farmed at Yew Tree since the Napoleonic Wars. Surely, that's got to mean something.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为我的祖先，自拿破仑战争时期就在紫杉农场耕种，这总该有一定的意义。

yingyinNormal.en: I believe any man who take such pride in his natural naked state, will surely enjoy the brisk of the outdoors.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我相信任何为自己自然裸露而如此骄傲的男人。肯定会享受户外的清爽。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Surely</highlight> there must be some middle ground that balances zoos treatment of animals with their educational potential.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，必须要有一些中间立场来平衡动物园对待动物的方式和它们的教育潜力。

examination_example.sentence: "It <highlight>surely</highlight> seems plausible that happy people would be more forward-thinking and creative and lean towards R&D more than the average," said one researcher.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位研究人员说：“快乐的人比一般人更有远见和创造力，更倾向于研发，这似乎是合理的。”

examination_example.sentence: Second, it is <highlight>surely</highlight> a good thing that the money and attention come to science rather than go elsewhere.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其次，钱和注意力都投向科学而不是其他领域，这肯定是一件好事。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 确定无疑；确定；毫无疑问；当然
adj. 缺乏信心的；无把握的；不肯定的；不固定的；不确定的

word_family.mean: adj. 确信的；有把握的；肯定的；确定的；一定的；可信的；无可置疑的

examination_example.sentence: If it is, then you can easily send it back to the manufacturer, and they'll send you a brand-new one for free <highlight>surely</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果是的话，你可以很容易地把它退回给制造商，他们肯定会免费送你一个全新的。

examination_example.sentence: And <highlight>surely</highlight> we will aim to finally eradicate disease and poverty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，我们的目标是最终根除疾病和贫困。

examination_example.sentence: It's simply not true that economic growth will <highlight>surely</highlight> make our world cleaner.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经济增长一定会使我们的世界更干净，这是不正确的。

examination_example.sentence: Slowly but <highlight>surely</highlight>, these platforms create a bridge between traditional enterprises and this emerging economy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些平台在传统企业和新兴经济体之间架起了一座桥梁，虽然缓慢，但毫无疑问。

examination_example.sentence: The most annoying ones for café owners must <highlight>surely</highlight> be those usually only two of them who occupy a table for six.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于咖啡馆老板来说，最令人恼火的肯定是两个人占用了一张六人桌。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 当然; 必定; 无疑

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 确定无疑；确定；毫无疑问；当然

word_family.mean: adj. 确信的；有把握的；肯定的；确定的；一定的；可信的；无可置疑的

sense_info_list.zh: 当然; 必定; 无疑

examination_example.sentence: You can borrow this film—<highlight>surely</highlight> you will enjoy watching it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以借用这部电影，你肯定会喜欢的。

examination_example.sentence: I believe your fish will <highlight>surely</highlight> know when it is feeding time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我相信你的鱼一定会知道什么时候该喂食。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Surely</highlight> happiness was the purpose of living.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，幸福是生活的目的。
